repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:6.9.1
MAINTAINER gnidan

# jessie : python 2.7
# python 2.7 only is supported by node-gyp (needed by truffle)
RUN \
    apt-get update \
    && \
    apt-get install -qy  --no-install-recommends \
        make \
        gcc \
        g++ \
        python=2.7\* \
    && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN \
    npm install -g truffle@^3.0.0 && npm cache clean --force;

RUN \
    apt-get purge -y --auto-remove \
        make \
        gcc \
        g++
